text: Chhapra Magarvi is a village in the Dhanghata tehsil of Sant Kabir Nagar district in the Uttar Pradesh state in India. ==See also== * Dhanghata ==References== ;General * India Govt. data * Govt. Website for Sant Kabir Nagar Category:Villages in Sant Kabir Nagar district
title: Chhapra Magarbi
